AdditionalFields.Value: Regulatory Science and Policy,Science and Health Policy,Survivorship

Description: This session will examine the role of real-world data in clinical research and practice and the potential applications of real-world data by addressing the following topics: 1) Crosstalk with clinical trials to broaden eligibility criteria; 2) Assessment of efficacy and safety in populations typically ineligible for clinical trials; 3) Provide contemporary data to enhance clinical trials; 4) Real world safety data, supporting clinical practice; 5) Rare patient subsets and populations; 6) Regulatory perspectives on RWD and Evidence.
SearchResultBody: DC02. Quality Over Quantity: Advancing Real World Data toward Real World Evidence
Title: Quality Over Quantity: Advancing Real World Data toward Real World Evidence
